title: BBC Local Live: Essex on Monday, 25 April 2016 - BBC News
summary: the body of a man and a dead dog are found in a burned-out caravan close to the essex coast .
nearly 3,000 appointments will be cancelled at essex hospitals as a result of the latest junior doctors ' strike .
colchester united chairman robbie cowling says he accepts responsibility for the club 's relegation from league one on saturday .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: that 's all from us at essex live today - thanks for stopping by .
we 'll be back tomorrow from 08:00 with the latest news , sport , weather and travel for the county .
have a great evening .

documents.title: weather : showers clearing to leave a slight overnight frost
text: a band of showers , locally heavy and perhaps wintry over high ground , will clear away towards the south-west this evening .
isolated wintry showers will follow overnight along with clear periods , and a slight frost will form .
minimum temperature : 1c ( 34f ) .
tomorrow will be windy and feeling cold with sunny spells and isolated showers .
the showers are most likely through the afternoon and may fall as hail or sleet .
stay up-to-date with the latest forecast at bbc weather .
author: Alex Dolan
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: boy , 16 , charged with chelmsford knife possession
text: a 16-year-old boy has been charged with possessing a knife in chelmsford city centre .
the teenager , who can not be named for legal reasons , was arrested on sunday evening after being challenged by a police dog and his handler .
he has since been released on bail and is due to appear at chelmsford youth court next month .
author: Nick Alliker
BBC Essex

documents.title: lancaster bomber 's tail was the only part intact after world war two crash
text: this photo shows what was left of the lancaster bomber which crashed in colchester on 25 april 1944 as it was trying to make an emergency landing at raf boxted in langham .

a memorial to the raf plane is just off ipswich road , while a commemoration service took place at the weekend at the new avellana place housing estate , where seven streets are named after the seven crew who died .

documents.title: headlines : thousands of essex appointments cancelled by junior doctors ' strike man 's body found after bradwell caravan fire
text: here are the top stories for essex :
author: Nick Alliker
BBC Essex

documents.title: get involved : birds nesting inside dunmow postbox
text: thanks to everyone who has got in touch about a postbox in dunmow that is temporarily out of order after birds began nesting inside .
it seems cigarette bins are also popular with our feathered friends
at my daughter 's place of work birds have started a nest in the cigarette butt box .
at our local village hall every year we have birds nest in the cigarette bin that is fixed to the side of the hall .
if you 've photographed some of the county 's rather more unusual nest box locations , send us a photo by email or to our facebook page .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: southend mp sir david amess warns barack obama : stay out of british politics
text: a southend mp has fired a broadside against barack obama 's `` misguided interfering '' in british politics .
author: Southend Echo

documents.title: junior doctors ' strike : nearly 3,000 appointments in essex cancelled
text: nearly 3,000 appointments at hospitals in essex will be cancelled tomorrow and wednesday as junior doctors walk out over a row at the prospect of a new contract in england .
industrial action is planned on both days from 08:00 to 17:00 .
this stoppage will see doctors stop providing emergency care for the first time in this dispute - and ever in the history of the nhs .
health secretary jeremy hunt described the strikes as `` extreme '' , warning they would be `` deeply worrying for patients '' and could end up risking safety .

documents.title: essex runner completes london marathon on 18th birthday
text: a big congratulations to becky manners , from manningtree , who took part in yesterday 's london marathon .
on her 18th birthday .
the teenager , who ran alongside her parents , was one of about 38,000 runners taking part in the 26.2 mile course .
she managed to complete the run in a respectable five hours and 49 minutes .

documents.title: caravan fire : man believed to be a 23-year-old visiting with family
text: a man whose body was found inside a burned-out caravan is believed to be a 23-year-old who was visiting bradwell-on-sea with his family .
the blaze , which happened yesterday morning near maldon road , `` was not visible '' from the road or any other property , essex police says .
the body of a dog was also inside the caravan .
a post-mortem examination will take place tomorrow .
author: Claire Sawyer
BBC Essex

documents.title: colchester united relegation : chairman accepts responsibility
text: colchester united chairman robbie cowling says he accepts responsibility for the club 's relegation from league one on saturday .
the u 's 0-3 defeat at home to burton saw them drop to the bottom tier of english football for the first time in 18 years .
cowling told bbc essex sport : `` i want to look at what i can do better and what i can do as a chairman i 'm not going to put the blame anywhere else . ''
author: Ben Fryer
BBC Essex sport

documents.title: seven streets named after seven dead world war two airmen
text: seven streets on the new avellana place housing estate in colchester have been named after seven raf and royal canadian air force crew who died on 25 april 1944 when their lancaster bomber was shot .
they crashed while attempting to land at raf boxted in langham .
the photo shows the memorial to the dead on ipswich road , while the streets are named as follows :

documents.title: beech king air confirmed for clacton airshow line-up
text: the beech king air is set to make a return to the line-up at clacton airshow this year .
tendring district council this morning announced the twin engine turboprop monoplane is back after it was last seen at the event in 2012 .
used as a training aircraft , the king air is capable of carrying up to six passengers or freight .
you will be able to see it on day one of the event which takes place on 25 and 26 august .

documents.title: one to sum up the weather in essex ?
text: we think this taken by bbc weather watcher `` amanda '' sums up the essex weather over the last couple of days perfectly .
it was captured down in leigh-on-sea yesterday .
it does feel a bit like winter out there does n't it ?
remember we love seeing your you can email us , tweet us , or visit our facebook page .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: weather : turning colder with the chance of sleet
text: after a bright start to the afternoon with a few showers , cloud is likely to thicken again from the north introducing some light rain and perhaps sleet by early evening .
it will feel chilly in the wind .
maximum temperature : 11c ( 52f ) .
heading out ?
get the latest forecast wherever you are from bbc weather .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: headlines : man and dog found after bradwell caravan fire nesting birds close dunmow postbox
text: here are the top stories from essex this lunchtime :
author: Nick Alliker
BBC Essex

documents.title: electrics fault plunges 1,200 students into darkness at essex university campus accomodation
text: about 1,200 essex university students are being kept in the dark for up to three weeks following electrical faults in their accommodation .
author: Daily Gazette

documents.title: nesting birds put dunmow postbox out of action
text: a postbox in dunmow is awaiting a special delivery after birds built a nest inside .
the box , which was spotted by dan jennings who tweeted : `` caring essex '' , has been temporarily put out of action .

a royal mail spokeswoman said birds take up residency in their postboxes from time to time , adding : `` we would place a notice on the box requesting that customers do not use it so the nesting birds are not disturbed . ''
have you seen any other barmy birds ' nests in essex ?
get in touch with the details .
caring essex @ twitterid @ twitterid # essex
@ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid hi dan .
would it be ok to use this in our paper and on our website please .
many thanks
@ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid hello i guess i missed this as a little late , sorry , yes no problem
@ twitterid hi can we use your on our website please dan ?
@ twitterid yes of course .
@ twitterid great thanks

documents.title: rain delays start of essex 's county championship match
text: rain has delayed the start of essex 's county championship match with northamptonshire .
an early lunch will be taken so there will be no play before 13:00 this afternoon .
essex are 335 for 3 on day two .
you can follow live updates here .
author: Ben Fryer
BBC Essex sport

documents.title: fatal caravan blaze 'was out ' before fire crews arrived
text: i 've been to maldon road in bradwell-on-sea where the bodies of a man and a dog were discovered in a burned-out caravan yesterday .
essex fire and rescue says three fire engines were called at about 11:41 - but the blaze was out before they arrived .
an investigation is currently under way to establish the cause .
author: Chris Flynn
BBC Essex

documents.title: motorcyclist dies after southminster crash
text: a motorcyclist has died after his vehicle left the road in southminster yesterday , police say .
the rider , a 36-year-old man from benfleet , was discovered on the b1021 cripplegate at 13:30 .
he was taken to the royal london hospital but later died .
the road was closed for more than four hours while investigations were carried out .

documents.title: ww2 housing estate 'memorial ' planned by men in a shed
text: streets on a new housing estate in colchester have been named after the crew of a fatal world war two plane crash after a group of men hatched a plot in a shed .
the friends from langham were behind the plan to commemorate the crew of an raf lancaster bomber ( similar to the one crashed near raf boxted in 1944 .

roy 'lofty ' tolhurst said : `` we have a silly sunday club where we meet up and there was a chance remark about the lancaster and nobody seemed to have any recollection of it and it seemed appropriate to mark that it happened before it was completely lost . ''

documents.title: housing estate honours world war two air crash crew
text: a ceremony took place at the weekend to honour seven crew members of a lancaster bomber which crashed in the area of langham , near colchester , in world war two .
the raf plane was shot by a german fighter over norfolk and it crashed short of raf boxted on 25 april 1944 .
seven roads on the new avellana place estate off ipswich road in colchseter bear the crew members names .
author: Andrew Woodger
BBC News

documents.title: hundreds of essex bhs workers face job threat
text: hundreds of bhs workers in essex have been told this morning the company is to file for administration .
five of the chain 's 164 stores are in our county , but the company has been struggling with debts and a large pension deficit .

in a letter to staff , bhs owner dominic chappell said : `` it is with a deep heart that i have to report , despite a massive effort from the team , we have been unable to secure a funder or a trade sale . ''
business live : bhs teeters on the brink

documents.title: 'duty-free , mr president ? '
text: today 's main image is of barack obama 's aeroplane leaving stansted airport , thanks to steve smith of maldon .
the us president 's visit has been dominated by the arguments about the uk 's membership of the european union .
author: Andrew Woodger
BBC News

documents.title: bodies of man and dog discovered inside burned-out caravan
text: the bodies of a man and a dog have been found inside a burned-out caravan in bradwell , police say .
officers attended land off maldon road at about 11:35 yesterday morning following reports that a caravan had been alight .
essex police is trying to identify the man and says his death is currently being treated as unexplained .

documents.title: travel : all lines reopen through chelmsford
text: following a points failure at chelmsford all lines are now open .
rs

documents.title: football league : five things you may have missed
text: saturday was a day of more downs than ups in the football league with the end of the season now in touching distance .
sport looks at five things you may have missed on an afternoon that saw mk dons , colchester and york city all suffer relegation .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: travel : three lanes reopen on m25 anticlockwise
text: three lanes have reopened on the anticlockwise m25 at waltham abbey after a car overturned earlier .
you can stay up-to-date with the latest travel news here .
thanks to @ twitterid for assistance righting overturned car .
this is scene at # m25 j26 acw 3 lanes open

documents.title: greater anglia disruption expected until 10:00
text: engineers are expected onsite at a points failure in chelmsford at 09:00 , greater anglia says .
there are currently cancellations and delays on trains through the city 's railway station .
only one track is open .
disruption is expected until 10:00 .

documents.title: travel : m25 anticlockwise closed due to overturned car
text: the anticlockwise m25 is currently closed due to an overturned car at j26 from waltham abbey .
congestion is currently back to j27 for the m11 .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: weather : scattered showers , becoming wintry later
text: there will be a fair amount of cloud around this morning bringing a few light showers but skies should brighten a little this afternoon .
maximum temperature : 11c ( 52f ) .
you can stay up-to-date with the latest forecast for your area with bbc weather .
author: Kate Kinsella
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: essex ukip accused of false election signature
text: ukip has been accused of using someone 's name and signature on an election form without their knowledge .
rupert duke 's name appears on nomination papers for a ukip candidate in council elections in essex .
mr duke , who was not a member of the party , said it was `` a disgrace '' and he had reported the matter to police .
ukip 's election agent for castle point borough council said it was an `` administration error '' .
author: Simon Dedman
BBC Essex

documents.title: welcome to essex live
text: good morning and welcome to our essex live page - how was your weekend ?
join us until 18:00 for the latest news across the county .
if you 'd like to get in touch you can email me , tweet us , or visit our facebook page .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live
